Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A/B Typing Kit for detection and surveillance of influenza A/B viruses in respiratory specimens using RT-PCR technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of influenza virus type A or B from viral RNA in upper and lower respiratory tract specimens and viral culture from human patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection; provides epidemiologic information for surveillance of circulating influenza viruses.
